metadata.title: Ziqiang He's Website
metadata.description: Ziqiang He's personal space, a world full of creativity and technology

home.description: I am a Full-stack Enginer with years of experience in React and Node.js development. I previously worked as Staff Software Enginer in companies such as Alibaba and Xiaohongshu . In times of great change, I stay the same at heart — using tech to make life better. Let's exchange ideas, technologies, and opportunities together.

about.title: Hey! I'm Ziqiang
about.intro1: A full-stack engineer based in Hangzhou, specializing in the React + Node.js tech stack with over 8 years of development experience.
about.intro2: I previously worked as a Staff Engineer at Alibaba and Xiaohongshu, focusing on e-commerce and SaaS. Specialized in high-performance, large-scale marketing platforms, real-time collaborative admin system, and global e-commerce apps. Skilled in performance optimization, SEO, and multi-device responsive development.
about.intro3: I'm experienced with English working environments and asynchronous collaboration across time zones, including North America, the UK, Singapore, and India. I also have 3 years of team management experience (6–10 people).
about.intro4: I love exploring new technologies and ideas, and enjoy building and refining products from the ground up. Outside of work, I like hiking, cycling, and shooting. Happy to connect and chat!
about.urbanicDescription: Urbanic is a London-based global fashion company. I'm responsible for developing the core e-commerce app and website using the React and Node.js tech stack. I also handle Google SEO optimization to drive user growth
about.xiaohongshuDescription: Led SaaS product development to enhance enterprise productivity by breaking data silos through info aggregation and workflow engine. Solved performance bottlenecks by introducing LRU caching and OT collaborative algorithms.
about.alibabaDescription: Designed and implemented the Double 11 marketing page builder system, including a module center, page builder, and data delivery platform, supporting stable operation of millions of pages under billion-level traffic. Also responsible for C-end marketing projects like Tmall Black Box, covering H5 campaign pages and mobile app features.
about.teambitionDescription: Developed Node.js backend services for enterprise project management, task tracking, and document collaboration. Designed and implemented an enterprise-grade role & permission control system, supporting the company’s growth from Series A to Series C funding.
about.universityName: East China University of Science and Technology
about.universityDescription: Bachelor of Science, Top-tier Chinese University (985/211)

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: These are some of the projects I have completed recently, including both company projects and personal projects. Welcome any discussions.
